name: boyishness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being like a boy: The actor radiates eager boyishness. He has a boyishness that makes him look much younger than his 48 years.
More examplesFewer examplesHe has a certain charming boyishness.She brought out the boyishness in Michael.Audrey Hepburn had short hair and nobody ever accused her of boyishness.
